DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study establish recommend dose ipilimumab administer combination paclitaxel carboplatin Japanese patient nonsmall-cell lung cancer .
DOC.brief_title: Japanese Study Ipilimumab Administered Combination With Paclitaxel/Carboplatin Patients With Nonsmall-cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Key Histologically cytologically document nonsmallcell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) present stage IIIB disease without indication definitive radiotherapy , stage IV disease , recurrent disease follow radiation therapy surgical resection No prior chemotherapy , hormonal therapy , immunotherapy , targetedtherapy—containing regimen treatment NSCLC Life expectancy least 3 month Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance score 01 Adequate bone marrow function Hemoglobin ≥9.0 g/dL Absolute neutrophil count ≥1,500/mm^3 Platelet count ≥100,000/mm^3 Adequate liver function Total bilirubin level ≤2.0*the upper limit normal ( ULN ) Asparate aminotransferase level ≤2.5*ULN Alanine aminotransferase level ≤2.5*ULN Adequate renal function Calculated creatinine clearance base Cockcroft Gault formula ≥50 mL/min . Key Symptomatic central nervous system ( CNS ) metastasis active CNS metastasis require medication Malignant body cavity fluid ( eg , pleural effusion , cardiac effusion , ascites ) recur despite appropriate supportive care Prior radiation ≥30 % major bonemarrow contain area ( pelvis , lumbar spine ) Documented history severe autoimmune immunemediated symptomatic disease require prolonged ( longer 2 month ) systemic immunosuppressant treatment Documented history motor neuropathy consider autoimmune origin ( eg , Guillain Barré syndrome ) Any concurrent malignancy nonmelanoma skin cancer , carcinoma situ cervix , carcinoma situ breast , carcinoma mucous membrane gastrointestinal tract , superficial bladder cancer treat systemic therapy ≥Grade 2 diarrhea History concurrent disease gastrointestinal tract perforation ≥Grade 2 peripheral neuropathy ( motor sensory ) Uncontrolled intercurrent illness include infection require systemic therapy , symptomatic congestive heart failure , uncontrolled hypertension , uncontrolled angina pectoris , uncontrolled peptic ulcer , cardiac arrhythmia require medication Positive finding human immunodeficiency virus antibody , hepatitis B surface antigen , hepatitis C virus antibody .
